title: Watchlist Subject #9596690-00 (LaJuana A. Reid) (National Security Agency)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern: 

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

My name is LaJuana A. Reid.  I am illegally Watchlisted. My Watchlist Subject number is #9596690-00.

I have requested Homeland Security remove me from the Watchlist.  My DHS request  2022-IGFO-00166 , has been "In Process" since 6/8/2022.  Please provide me any and all documents of my watchlisting. including the nomination document.  I am also requesting that your agency remove me from the Watchlist and cease all activity in relation to my watchlisting.

 I am not watchlisted because of some illegal activity.  I am watchlisted because I am a victim of non consensual human experimentation. Illegally watchlisiting me has allowed the University of California and agencies under government contract to conduct remote illegal experiments on my body and brain, under the Obama Brain Initative.  March 2005 Ronald P. Gruber, MD, license # 22597 , illegally implanted my brain during elective rihnoplasty.  I have recent audio of Gruber admitting to performing brain implant surgery, although Gruber has never been a licensed Neurosurgon.  Gruber said he is now retired and UCSF  Neurology has taken over his cases. UCSF has been unresponsive in  my request for the removal of these illegal brain implants.  The frequencies emanting from my body have been traced back to law enforcement agencies and Homeland Security.  I request my name be  immediately be removed  from your Watchlist.  The  illegal implants in my brain have been confirmed  at Dameron Hospital.  "Apparent beam hardening artifact at the periphery bilaterally and over the middle temporal fossa and posterior fossa”.  A photonic semiconductor is a nonlinear beam hardening artifact / brain implant.  

The requested documents of my illegal watchlisting will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

LaJuana A. Reid
